goal:
The project to be undertaken by Karmapa Foundation Europe (KFE) is the establishment of a Centre in Brussels responsible for the visits of His Holiness the Karmapa in Europe.
The aim of the Foundation is to provide support for the activities of the Karmapa and his successors, as the Supreme Authority of the Kagyu Order.
During the lifetime of His Holiness the 17th Karmapa Ogyen Trinley Dorje, and his successors once enthroned, the objectives of the Foundation shall be as follows:
• To alleviate suffering in all its forms and to that end to provide both direct and indirect charitable assistance to those in need or to persons afflicted by hardship, physical or mental.
• To promote education in the sciences of mind and the philosophy of life, to organise and/or sponsor seminars and other educational programmes,
• To protect the environment and to that end to support initiatives for environmental protection, including the promotion of a balanced approach to the use of resources in relation to the limits of the planet.
• To preserve the specific cultural and artistic tradition of Tibet, so as to provide a stable basis that enables theTibetans to make their special contribution to the world.
• To sponsor and organise educational and cultural activities in the sphere of the science of mind, both traditional and contemporary, and that of other related disciplines which share the vision embodied in Foundation Statutes, namely:
• To assist cultural institutions, both lay and religious, with or without legal status, that help communities and/or individuals who share the vision embodied in the Foundation Statutes.
